Name: European Football Dynasty 2023
About the game: What happens when the best clubs in Europe play together in one league-system? When the champion is not already decided at the start of the season? And when even top clubs have to fight against relegation? Then you are at the European Football Dynasty! Start your adventure, take the job as a manager of a soccer team and lead your team to the title. The choice is yours. Start with your favorite city, create your very own club or prove yourself and take over crisis clubs on the free manager market. What to expect: - 5 top European leagues with clubs from all over Europe - Multiple levels of difficulty - from absolute beginner to Hall of Fame - Design freedom: Design your leagues with an editor or play with randomly generated squads - Intuitive and clear user interface - Focus on the essential game content and the important tasks of a manager What not to expect: - Time wasters, such as press conferences, player interviews, board meetings, ... - game animations - In-App purchases. There will be no 'in-app purchases'. Neither now, nor in the future. - Perfection - but as a one-man operation, I do everything I can to create a fluid gaming experience. I am looking forward to the release and wish you a lot of fun and success playing my game and creating a European Football Dynasty.
